result.execSummary:
The defendant Jason P Steinfeldt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Cocaine/Coca, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(c).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank; pay all approriate costs. Pay all applicable costs, surcharges and supervision fees by 02-28-18 or civil judgment will be entered with tax intercept
STRAIGHT TIME; No Good Time Credit. Defendant to report to the CJF on 03-03-17 by 6:30pm.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jason P Steinfeldt

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jason P Steinfeldt in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Statements made as to sentencing by State, Defense and Defendant.

Defendant sentenced to serve EIGHT (8) DAYS in the House of Correction with credit for FIVE (5) DAYS time served.  NO GOOD TIME CREDIT.  STRAIGHT TIME.  DEFENDANT TO REPORT TO THE CJF BY 06:30 PM ON 03-03-2017.

OTHER CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:

* Defendant to pay all applicable costs, surcharges and supervision fees BY 02-28-2018 or CIVIL JUDGMENT will be entered WITH tax intercept.

Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay all appropriate costs.

Filed,
Notice of Right to Seek Post-conviction Relief;
Pre-trial Incarceration Credit.

Defendant Jason P Steinfeldt in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin for Robert J. Hampton III.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Hearing proceeded on the Record.  Court held colloquy with the Defendant.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Sentencing.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for February 27, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

Signed Signature Bond to continue.    Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION. 
Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.  mn

Defendant Jason P Steinfeldt in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  Defendant Jason P Steinfeldt in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Ashley, Branch 33.  Scheduling conference scheduled for February 13, 2017 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Danielle Louise Shelton in court.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

On Motion of the State and failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  NO BAIL IS FORFEITED.

Defendant Jason P Steinfeldt in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant is not in compliance with the terms of the Deferred Prosecution Agreement.  Based upon the Defendant's non-compliance, the court revoked the Deferred Prosecution Agreement; proceedings reinstated.  Court orders entry of judgment of conviction.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 15, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Matter is RESCHEDULED to 05-03-2016 at 01:30 pm.  sdg

Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services "Court Reminders."   Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Jason P Steinfeldt in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Defendant Jason P Steinfeldt in custody.  Mark Patrick Dooley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  lnr.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Ashley, Branch 33.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 27, 2016 at 09:30 am.
JusticePoint DPA Discharge Summary.  Filed, sdg.
JusticePoint DPA Non-compliance Report.  Filed, sdg.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Defendant Jason P Steinfeldt not in court.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Matter before the Court on Motion of the DA's Office.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  NO BAIL IS FORFEITED.

Defendant Jason P Steinfeldt in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin. sdg
Defense reports that Defendant is employed doing Home repair.  Defendant has NOT completed Community Service yet, Habitat for Humanity may be the venue.  Court ordered matter adjourned for Final Review hearing.  Review hearing scheduled for February 2, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Deferred Prosecution Agreement Progress report, received and filed. sdg

Defendant Jason P Steinfeldt in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Parties are prepared to enter into a deferred prosecution agreement.
Defendant was advised of constitution rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights and entered a plea of GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights, Addendum  and Elements/Jury Instructions, received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the guilty plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the Information.  Court WITHHELD entry of judgment of conviction.  Deferred Prosecution Agreement received, signed and filed.   All parties notified, effective August 3, 2015 this case is assigned to Judge Carl Ashley, Branch 33, in room 113 in the Safety Building.  Any right of substitution begins to run as of the date of receipt of this notice, unless notified by the court on an earlier date. Court ordered case adjourned for review hearing in Branch 33.  Review hearing scheduled for September 28, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jason P Steinfeldt in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case calendared for plea/sentencing hearing.
Court ordered stayed warrant lifted.
Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 24, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case calendared for plea/sentencing hearing.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date.
Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 19, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Jason P Steinfeldt in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea/dpa. For reasons stated on the record, Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea / dpa in Branch 37.  Plea hearing scheduled for May 13, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Jason P Steinfeldt in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
 Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.
  Pretrial conference held off record. Possible DPA.  Case is adjourned for plea/ DPA hearing, Branch 37.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea hearing scheduled for April 29, 2015 at 08:30 am.

The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
   Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Jason P Steinfeldt in court with attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal.  Defendant Jason P Steinfeldt in custody.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 24, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
